UpdateSourceArgs: -NoProfile -Command "$ProgressPreference='SilentlyContinue'; [Net.ServicePointManager]::SecurityProtocol = [Net.SecurityProtocolType]::Tls12; Set-Location -Path 'halo-ce'; (Invoke-RestMethod -UseBasicParsing -Uri 'https://halomaps.org/hce/detail.cfm?fid=410') -match 'name=\"hash\" value=\"(?<Hash>[A-Fa-f0-9]+)\"' | Out-Null; $CURRENT_HASH = $matches['Hash']; Invoke-WebRequest -UseBasicParsing -Uri 'https://halomaps.org/hce/detail.cfm#top' -Method Post -Body @{ fid = \"410\"; action = \"dl\"; hash = \"$CURRENT_HASH\" } -OutFile 'haloce.exe'; & 7-Zip\7z.exe x -y -aoa haloce.exe -oserver maps\* | Out-Null; Remove-Item -Path 'haloce.exe' -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Out-Null"

-c "cd halo-ce && CURRENT_HASH=$(wget -qO- \"https://halomaps.org/hce/detail.cfm?fid=410\" | sed -n \"s/.*name=\\\"hash\\\" value=\\\"\([A-Fa-f0-9]\+\)\\\".*/\1/p\") && wget -qO haloce.exe --post-data=\"fid=410&action=dl&hash=$CURRENT_HASH\" https://halomaps.org/hce/detail.cfm#top && 7-Zip/7zzs x -y -aoa haloce.exe -oserver maps/* >/dev/null 2>&1 && rm -f halo-ce.exe >/dev/null 2>&1"

-NoProfile -Command "$ProgressPreference='SilentlyContinue'; [Net.ServicePointManager]::SecurityProtocol = [Net.SecurityProtocolType]::Tls12; Set-Location -Path 'halo-ce/server'; Invoke-WebRequest -UseBasicParsing -Uri 'https://www.elitegameservers.net/sapp/downloads/sapp_ce.zip' -OutFile 'sapp_ce.zip'; & ..\7-Zip\7z.exe x -y -aoa sapp_ce.zip | Out-Null; Remove-Item -Path 'sapp_ce.zip' -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Out-Null"
-c "cd halo-ce/server && wget -q https://www.elitegameservers.net/sapp/downloads/sapp_ce.zip && ../7-Zip/7zzs x -y -aoa sapp_ce.zip >/dev/null 2>&1 && rm -f sapp_ce.zip >/dev/null 2>&1"
